text: Research team announces a breakthrough in fusion energy using novel confinement methods.
Local sports club wins championship after a dramatic overtime victory.
New AI technique reduces hallucinations in language models via adaptive reranking.
Market report: semiconductor demand rises as new fabs ramp production worldwide.
Scientists detect water vapor signatures on an exoplanet within the habitable zone.
City council approves initiative to expand green public transportation.
A startup releases an open-source data filtering toolkit with explainable scoring.
Breakthrough in protein folding simulation accelerates drug discovery timelines.
Severe weather warning issued as atmospheric rivers approach the coastline.
A new battery material promises faster charging with longer cycle life.
